itemDisplayName: Multiple VMs with a Load Balancer and Data Lake Gen2 Storage
description: This template allows you to create multiple Virtual Machines under a Load balancer and configure a load balancing rule on Port 80. This template also deploys a Datalake Gen2 Storage Account, Virtual Network, Public IP addresses, Availability Set and Network Interfaces.
summary: Multiple VMs with a Load Balancer and Data Lake Gen2 Storage
